greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Write the factorial of each term in A036043(n).
comment: Sequence A036043 measures the length of numeric partitions.
program: return [factorial(len(p)) for k in (0..n) for p in Partitions(n, length=k)]
for n in (0..10): print(A178803_row(n)) # _Peter Luschny_, Nov 02 2019
xref: Cf. A000041 (shape sequence), A000142 (factorials), A036043, A101880 (row sums).
results.author: _Alford Arnold_, Jun 17 2010
